title: Technical Data on Oil and Gas Equipment and Services Equities -- Weatherford Intl., Halliburton, Oil States Intl., Tidewater, and Forum Energy Technologies
content:
NEW YORK 

Equity Research Institute has initiated coverage on the following equities: Weatherford International PLC (NYSE: WFT), Halliburton Company (NYSE: HAL), Oil States International Inc. (NYSE: OIS), Tidewater Inc. (NYSE: TDW), and Forum Energy Technologies Inc. (NYSE: FET). Free research report on Weatherford Intl Weatherford International PLC's stock finished Monday's session 6.09% lower at $8.17 

https://www.erionline.net/WFT.pdf

On Monday, shares in Halliburton Co. ended the session 4.82% lower at $34.93 

https://www.erionline.net/HAL.pdf

Oil States International Inc.'s stock lost 3.54%, to close the day at $26.72 

https://www.erionline.net/OIS.pdf

On Monday, shares in Tidewater Inc. recorded a trading volume of 1.23 million shares, close to their three months average volume of 1.28 million shares. The stock ended the day 7.26% lower at $13.42 

https://www.erionline.net/TDW.pdf

Forum Energy Technologies Inc.'s stock lost 3.64%, to close Monday's session at $12.72 

https://www.erionline.net/FET.pdf

--

About Equity Research Institute: Equity Research Institute ("ERI") produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. ERI has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps.
